casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Bernard George LAMP, Jr. No. 222A14-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Nov. 9, 2015. Anne M. Gomez, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Lamp, Bernard George (Jr.). Kathleen M. Joyce, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Lamp, Bernard George (Jr.). Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Sarah M. Kirkman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Sarah Kirkman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 6th of November 2015 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of November 2015."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 14th day of December 2015 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
